name: Dog Crossing
description:
**To close the game, go to the menu screen (die if you're currently in a run) and hold down any button for 3 seconds.**

Dog Crossing is a game about crossing the road with your dog.

  • The dog will walk around randomly within a radius of the player.
  • Press any button to jump the player towards the dog.
    • Jumping will stop the dog; you can use this to redirect him.
    • Yelling at your screen may also help direct the dog.
  • Cross as many roads as you can without getting hit. Make sure to go up because you won't get points for going down.

Credits:

  • Art: me (Peas_N_Carrots)
  • Programming: me (Peas_N_Carrots)
  • Sound Effects: zapsplat.com

This game was made for the one button game jam, so you only need one button to play!
